//

    vs_3_0
    def c4, 0.5, 6.28318548, -3.14159274, 0
    def c13, 1, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord v2
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov o0, v1
    mul o1, c13.xxyy, v2.xyxx
    mul r0, c7, v0.y
    mad r0, c6, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, v0.z, r0
    mad r0, c9, v0.w, r0
    add r1.x, r0.z, -c5.z
    mov r1.w, c10.w
    mad r1.x, r1.w, r1.x, c11.x
    add r1.x, r1.x, c4.x
    frc r1.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, r1.x, c4.y, c4.z
    sincos r2.y, r1.x
    mul r1.xyz, c10, v1
    mad r0.xyz, r2.y, r1, r0
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c12.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c12, r0

mov o3, r0 // Relocated from line 58 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 8C760F0F.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o3, r0 // Relocated to line 57 with shadertool.py
